name: news
description: p/news is: real news articles pertaining to the world at large written in objectivity's best interest. p/news is not: editorials, conspiracies (see p/conspiracies), obstinate party loyalty, shouting, kitty pictures, etc.. Should probably remove this category.

name: technology
description: dedicated to the news and discussions about the creation and use of technology and its surrounding issues.

name: conspiracies
description: dedicated to exploring a wide range of unconventional, suppressed, & esoteric topics with the brightest minds for our troubled times.
